info.task: navigate to first item in menu
info.title: Navigate to the first item in a menu in interaction mode

setupScript.name: openMenuAndSetFocusToLastItem
setupScript.description: opens the menu, and sets focus on 'Action 4'

user: With focus on the 'Action 4' menu item, navigate to the first menu item.
instructions.raw: With focus on the 'Action 4' menu item, navigate to the first menu item.
instructions.mode: If NVDA did not make the focus mode sound when the test page loaded, press Insert+Space to turn focus mode on.

assertions.expectation: Role of the focused item, 'menu item', is conveyed
Name of the focused item, 'Action 1', is conveyed
Position of the focused item in the menu (1) is conveyed
Number of items in the menu (4) is conveyed
